author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
Does Adam Savage believe in perpetual motion? What is a "thou"? Is there a film Adam regrets being a part of ... or regrets NOT being a part of? In this live stream excerpt Adam answers these questions from Tested members Randy Morrow, BThings and Patrick Hennessy, whom we thank for their support! 

Mitutoyo 505-742-51 D6"TX-1 Dial Caliper: https://amzn.to/3KPjdEB
(Adam's caliper has a pink vs blue face b/c he bought that particular one used on Craigslist, but his regular Mitutoyo calipers is at the link above.)
Starrett 6" Dial Caliper: https://amzn.to/3Ebvxb5
Disclaimer: Tested may earn an affiliate commission when you buy through the links here
Join this channel to support Tested and get access to perks, like asking Adam a question:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCiDJtJKMICpb9B1qf7qjEOA/join

00:00 Perpetual motion
00:55 Thou
06:30 Regretful movies

Subscribe for more videos (and click the bell for notifications):  http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=testedcom
Tes
title: Is Perpetual Motion Possible?

author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
While learning about full-faced armored helmets from associate conservator Sean Belair at  @metmuseum, #AdamSavage learns an interesting — and brilliant! — engineering solution to a problem faced by cavalrymen in medieval times. Did you guess correctly why there are no breathing holes on the left side of this 14th century helmet?

Subscribe for more videos (and click the bell for notifications):  http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=testedcom
title: Where Are The Breathing Holes in This Full-Faced Armored Helmet? #adamsavage
